Ever hear of Tenebrix or Ixcoin? Haven't heard of them?  They were hot new altcoins back in 2011.  A bit of trivia: Litecoin code was forked from Tenebrix, which used Scrypt for proof-of-work first. A lot of altcoins right now will be forgotten in the same way.
